item.title: CVE-2024-43970|2024-09-18T14:13:30.543Z -- surecart -- surecart
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SureCart allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects SureCart: from n/a through 2.29.3.
